docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Paladino said that he had meant to email his remarks to friends, but inadvertently sent them to Artvoice, a Buffalo weekly, which published them.
docs.abstract: Carl Paladino, member of Buffalo Board of Education, says he did not intend to send racist remarks about Pres and Michelle Obama to weekly newspaper Artvoice for publication, and that he will not heed calls for his resignation.

headline.main: Carl Paladino, a Trump Ally, Says Racist Remarks About Obamas Were Sent in Error
